Description: Cozy 1 bedroom apartment in Allston. Right on the Brookline border. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Virtual tour is available. Heat and hot water included. Laundry in the building. Only 1/2 months broker fee. Call now!
